item.title: Ani add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "The trouble with a mask is it never changes" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Ani add a quote by Harry Crews
item.description: "If you love something/Set it free/If it loves you/It will come back to you/ If it doesn't--hunt it down and kill it." -- Harry Crews

item.title: Ani add a quote by Banana Yoshimoto
item.description: "Even when I try to stir myself up, I just get irritated because I can't make anything come out. And in the middle of the night I lie here thinking about all this. If I don't get back on track somehow, I'm dead, that's the sense I get. There isn't a single strong emotion inside me." -- Banana Yoshimoto

item.title: Ani add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "But even so, every now and then I would feel a violent stab of loneliness. The very water I drink, the very air I breathe, would feel like long, sharp needles. The pages of a book in my hands would take on the threatening metallic gleam of razor blades. I could hear the roots of loneliness creeping through me when the world was hushed at four o'clock in the morning." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Ani add a quote by Donald Barthelme
item.description: "The confusing signals, the impurity of the signal, gives you verisimilitude, as when you attend a funeral and notice that it's being poorly done." -- Donald Barthelme

item.title: Ani add a quote by Lara Glenum
item.description: "...All that grotty jiz crusting to sugar in my ass crevice..." -- Lara Glenum

item.title: Ani add a quote by Sam Pink
item.description:
"from the poem <i>Holographic Personality Disgrace</i>:
Some people are such assholes that saying, "Look, again, I'm sorry I cut off my thumb and glued it to your baby's head because I thought you'd like him better as a unicorn" means nothing to them." -- Sam Pink

item.title: Ani add a quote by Joy Williams
item.description: "Words at night were feral things." -- Joy Williams

item.title: Ani add a quote by Sam Pink
item.description: "And I realize that there is nothing to worry about without first wanting to be alive a certain way. That is somewhat relaxing to think." -- Sam Pink
